title: [b]Enable Flavor Divider[/b]
desc:
Adds flavor divider to rendered card when appropriate.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Remove Flavor Text[/b]
desc:
Renders cards without flavor text.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Remove Reminder Text[/b]
desc:
Renders cards without reminder text.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Collector Mode[/b]
desc:
Default: Formats collector info like modern cards pre-2023.
Modern: Formats collector info like March of the Machine and onwards.
Minimal: Only includes artist, set code, and language.
Artist: Only includes artist.
[b](Default: 'default')[/b]

title: [b]Collector Promo Star[/b]
desc:
Whether to use the promo star in collector info text on supported templates.
[b](Default: 'disabled')[/b]

title: [b]Symbol Render Mode[/b]
desc:
SVG: Renders using SVG files sourced from CCGHQ.
Font: Renders using Keyrune font + layer effects.
None: Completely disables expansion symbol.
[b](Default: 'svg')[/b]

title: [b]Default Expansion Symbol[/b]
desc:
Symbol used when an automatic symbol couldn't be found. Enter an appropriate Magic the Gathering set code.
List of Keyrune symbols and setcode: https://keyrune.andrewgioia.com/cheatsheet.html
[b](Default: 'MTG')[/b]

title: [b]Force Default Expansion Symbol[/b]
desc:
Forces Proxyshop to always used the Default Expansion Symbol chosen above.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Default Expansion Symbol Outline[/b]
desc:
Changes the thickness of the expansion symbol outline when not fully automated.
[b](Default: 6)[/b]

title: [b]Enable Watermark[/b]
desc:
Automatically generate watermark when detected and supported.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Watermark Default Opacity[/b]
desc:
Transparency value of the watermark, 0 being invisible 100 being fully visible.
[b](Default: 40)[/b]

title: [b]Manual Editing Mode[/b]
desc:
Pause the render process before saving to allow for manual edits.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Import Scryfall Scan[/b]
desc:
Will import the scryfall scan of each card into the document for reference. Useful for ensuring card accuracy when making manual changes.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Border Color[/b]
desc:
Choose the color of the card border used across templates. Will work on most templates, but considered experimental.
[b](Default: 'black')[/b]
